text: Walkowiak is a Polish surname: * Andrzej Walkowiak (born 1961, Bydgoszcz), Polish politician and journalist * Daniela Walkowiak-Pilecka (born 1935), Polish sprint canoer * David John Walkowiak (born 1953), prelate of the Roman Catholic Church * Mariusz Walkowiak (born 1970, Poznań), Polish sprint canoer * Roger Walkowiak (1927–2017), French road bicycle racer Category:Polish- language surnames Category:Patronymic surnames
title: Walkowiak
